text: Wilderness Outdoor Movie Theater is located in Trenton, Georgia off of Interstate 59, which is right next to the Tennessee/Georgia stateline. This theater claims to have the largest outdoor drive-in movie screen in the world. The theater has two movie screens, each showing a double feature three nights of the weekend when it is open during the season. General Admission is typically $7.00 per person while children are free.Wilderness Outdoor Theater ==See also== * List of drive-in theaters ==References== Category:Cinemas and movie theaters in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Drive-in theaters in the United States
title: Wilderness Outdoor Movie Theater
